properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 2:00PM EST until February 15 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
...Lake Effect Snow Will Develop For The Primary Snowbelt Tonight...

.An Arctic airmass will move across the Great Lakes this evening
through Friday which will develop bands of lake effect snow
showers. The heaviest amounts of lake effect snow will be in
primary Snowbelt region through Friday morning.

* WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3
to 5 inches expected.

* WHERE...Southern Erie county.

* WHEN...From 6 PM Friday to 10 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest snowfall amounts will primarily
be across inland Erie County.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania
Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on
driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania
roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and
traffic conditions.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM FRIDAY TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY
